cells.data:
• Short URLs, https://github.com/speps/go-hashids perhaps
  • Each event having what/where metadata.
  • One URL for setup, one for voting.
  • A date range.
  • A list of people, indicating Yes/No/Maybe for each date range.
  • A most popular date view.

// golang hashids
hd := hashids.NewData()
hd.Salt = "this is my salt"
h := hashids.NewWithData(hd)
id, _ := h.Encode([]int{1, 2, 3})
numbers, _ := h.DecodeWithError(id)
